Package tilt.image.page

The purpose of this package is to represent the visually identified parts of the page: the lines and word-shapes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Line
    Represent a discovered line in an image
    Merge
    Store and merge two or more shapes
    Page
    Represent a collection of lines already recognised on a page
    Split
    Split a polygon in appropriate places

Package tilt.image.page Description

The purpose of this package is to represent the visually identified parts of the page: the lines and word-shapes. The layout is basically as follows:

The package-info class allows the calculation of useful parameters for later processing: the median line-depth (distance between baselines) and the minimum word-gap. The latter is the basis for word-recognition in the image. See Getting word-spacing right

There is also the problem of merging adjacent shapes that align to the same word, and splitting shapes that align to different words. These operations are handled by the Split and Merge classes.
